Name: Beastrun
About the game: Beastrun is 1D auto battler that's all about building a party that synergizes. Create a team, equip items, skills and relics and watch how your team does against the teams of other players. The skills you equip on units are automatically executed, so when battling you can just sit back and watch the battle resolve! Features become the number 1 player in exciting pvp battles! over 35 different skills to find, level them up to make them stronger! over â€‹ 50 different items to collect! choose from 11 different animal types each with a special ability progress through 8 areas in adventure mode battle against a daily challenger in arena mode fight through increasingly harder battles with a challenging modifier in dungeon mode and collect precious relics Try different builds based on different mechanics such as: Freezing - slows down units and locks them in their position Burn - slowly racks up damage Poison - stack poison that deal massive damage based on its stack every 5 seconds Disrupt - move enemies from their positions, disabling their skills Tank - use items that give big health and defense boosts and use skills that heal your units Speed - use fast skills and items that make them even faster, giving your enemies no room to do anything! All of these archetypes builds can be mixed and there are plenty of skills, items and relics that make them even more interesting. Sokpop makes a new game every month! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
